data.event: Prior to 1877, the place was called Nicasio.
The San Geronimo post office opened in 1895, closed in 1910, and re-opened in 1911.

The San Geronimo post office opened in 1895, closed in 1910, and re-opened in 1911.
The 2010 United States Census reported that San Geronimo had a population of 446.
